trans-unit.source: Represents a JScript method.
trans-unit.target: 表示 JScript 方法。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the name binding category.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別屬於名稱繫結類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which this method was first declared.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>上第一次會宣告此方法是直接或間接基底類別方法的物件。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_this" name="this" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_this" name="this" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含附加至這個方法的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Object>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this method, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列，其中包含已附加至這個方法，只會搜尋指定型別的屬性的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> objects that has zero elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Object>零個元素的物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此方法的實作相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes> and <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes>和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes>。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes></xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the method, using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: 叫用方法，使用指定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object to call the method on.
trans-unit.target: 要上呼叫方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
trans-unit.target: 控制繫結的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，將類型從實質引數型別轉換成正式引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The argument list to pass to the method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至方法的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture or locale.
trans-unit.target: 提供特定文化特性或地區設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
trans-unit.target: 用來正確地格式化數字、 日期和字串。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的呼叫傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this method.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的屬性類型是否附加至這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The attribute type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要搜尋這個成員的繼承階層架構，以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of member that this method is.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個方法的成員類型。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of class derived from <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> that this class derives from.
trans-unit.target: 識別的類別衍生自類型<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>這個類別衍生自。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>, because this class derives from <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref>因為這個類別衍生自<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the internal metadata representation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個方法之內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the internal metadata representation of this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法之內部中繼資料表示控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來取得這個執行個體，透過反映的類別物件。

trans-unit.source: The type that declares this method.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個方法的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom attributes for the type of the return value of this method.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個方法的傳回值類型的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: null in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下為 null。
